verbose_text: After a 24 hr treatment (0, 2.5, 5, 10 muM), it was found that PD upregulated the expression of Bax, cleaved caspase8, cleaved caspase9, caspase3 and cleaved caspase3 and downregulated the expression of the Bcl2, PARP, caspase8, caspase9, E2F1, CDK2, CDK4, CDK6, CyclinD1, CDK1 and CycllinB1 proteins.
evidence: expression of the Bcl2, PARP, caspase8
